description: This table contains hospital account final diagnosis list information from the Hospital Accounts Receivable (HAR) master file.

columns.name: HSP_ACCOUNT_ID
columns.description: The ID number of a hospital account.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number in the results of a query. Since multiple final ICD diagnoses can be stored in one hospital account, each diagnosis will have a unique line number. The record associated with line 1 represents the principal final coded  diagnosis.

columns.name: DX_ID
columns.description: The system ID number of a final diagnosis code stored in the hospital account.

columns.name: DX_AFFECTS_DRG_YN
columns.description:
Specifies if the diagnosis affects the diagnosis-related group (DRG) associated with the hospital account.  1-yes, 2-no


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Yes


No

columns.name: DX_COMORBIDITY_YN
columns.description:
Specifies if the diagnosis is a non-complication/comorbidity ("N"),  complication/comorbidity ("Y"), or major complication/comorbidity ("Y").   Note that this column is extracted as an explicit "N" or "Y", where "Y" is used for both CC and MCC.  The updated column DX_COMORBIDITY_C can be used to distinguish between CC and MCC diagnoses.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


CC


No


MCC

columns.name: FINAL_DX_SOI_C_NAME
columns.description:
Stores the final diagnosis severity of illness


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Refinement not possible


Minor


Moderate


Major


Extreme


Principal Dx Used for SOI/ROM Calc


Excluded


Duplicate Diagnosis


Excluded Complication of Care

columns.name: FINAL_DX_ROM_C_NAME
columns.description:
Stores the final diagnosis risk of mortality


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: FINAL_DX_SOI_C_NAME

columns.name: FINAL_DX_EXCLD_YN
columns.description:
Stores whether the final diagnosis should be excluded from clinical reporting


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: DX_AFFECTS_DRG_YN

columns.name: FNL_DX_AFCT_SOI_YN
columns.description:
Stores whether the diagnosis affects severity of illness.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: DX_AFFECTS_DRG_YN

columns.name: FNL_DX_AFCT_ROM_YN
columns.description:
Stores whether the diagnosis affects risk of mortality.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: DX_AFFECTS_DRG_YN

columns.name: FINAL_DX_POA_C_NAME
columns.description:
Specifies whether each diagnosis was present on admission.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Yes


No


Unknown


Clinically Undetermined


Exempt from POA reporting

columns.name: DX_COMORBIDITY_C_NAME
columns.description:
Specifies if complication / comorbidity exists for each diagnosis on the hospital account.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: DX_COMORBIDITY_YN

columns.name: DX_HAC_YN
columns.description:
Specifies if the diagnosis contributed to a Hospital Acquired Condition.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


No


Yes

columns.name: DX_COF_C_NAME
columns.description:
The COF (Condition Onset Flag) for the diagnosis. This item describes whether the diagnosis is onset during the episode (on) or outside of the timeframe of the episode (not).


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Onset during the episode


Not arising during the episode

columns.name: DX_COMPLEXITY_LVL
columns.description: The diagnosis complexity level - the complexity weight assigned to the diagnosis in relation to the DRG.

columns.name: COMPLEX_DX_C_NAME
columns.description:
The complex diagnosis indicator for the diagnosis code.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Complex Diagnosis
